name: Hexepta: Mayor Attack
storyline:
This game has six cases in it's main storyline, as well as two short side stories:
Case 1: The Hacked Turnabout
Case 2: Turnabout on the Road
Case 3: Turnabout in Flames
Case 4: Turnabout Apprentice
Case 5: The Stolen Turnabout
Case 6: The Sculpted Turnabout
Extra 1: Argus Hakan: Asinine Attorney
Extra 2: Storm Sente: Asinine Attorney
summary: After a young law student named Argus Hakan ends up defending in a trial on his mentor's behalf, he is thrust into a series of cases the following week, all involving various crimes that seem to target the mayor. Argus can solve these cases as they come, but there is clearly something more going on behind the scenes.
